content: for get the pdf file of free pattern you can click available for free on row above to go to my website and you can get the pdf file in the end of page note this is a pattern to make the knitted bunny her eggshell you are not buying an actual finished product my pdf knitting pattern was written in english the file is 11 pages pdf this pattern tutorial contains detailed instructions and 34 step-by-step photos the pattern provides all the necessary information to make lala it s very easy to follow techniques all pieces are knitted flat and sew seams finished size the finished bunny is 16 cm ----------------------- to download on cheryx com you scroll down past the written instructions and just past buy me a coffee you will see the download button to get pdf pattern please note this is free pattern if the web ask you pay for it it s mean you clicked the ads ❤️ -------------------- if you decide to make this pattern or any of my patterns please share your photos of finished toys with me on your ravelry project or tag me on instagram using the hashtag #cheryx knitadream i can t wait to see your creations see more my free knitting patterns see tips and tricks tutorial videos how to knit the patterns how to embroider the details how to make the accessories and more on https //cheryx com/
